testGames.gameEngineTest

Class DebugEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • android.gameengine.icadroids.engine.GameEngine
        • testGames.gameEngineTest.DebugEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAlarm, IFormInput
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollisionTest, GameEngineTestGame, testGame

    public abstract class DebugEngine
extends GameEngine
implements IFormInput, IAlarm
    An engine that extends GameEngine that displays a debug menu for debugging objects, alarms, sounds, tiles, life cycle and more.
    Author:
    Bas van der Zandt

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: GameEngine
        Allows the game to run logic such as updating the world, checking for collisions, gathering input, and playing audio.

        Override this method inside your game base class that extends from GameEngine. Every gameloop this method is called once.

        GameObjects that were added to the game (by either addPlayer or addGameObject) should NOT be updated here. Classes that extend from GameObject or MovableGameObject have their own update() that should be overwritten.

        Overrides:
        update in class GameEngine
        See Also:
        MoveableGameObject, GameObject

      • triggerAlarm

        Description copied from interface: IAlarm
        This method will be triggered when the alarm goes off.
        Specified by:
        triggerAlarm in interface IAlarm
        Parameters:
        alarmID - The given ID of the alarm
